long_description: The Petzl Mini Prusik pulley features side plates that are designed to prevent a prusik friction knot from jamming the sheave while hauling. Pulley is light and compact enough to be worn on your harness yet tough enough to handle big loads. Aluminum sheave is mounted on sealed ball bearings for excellent efficiency. Works with 7 - 11mm diameter ropes.
short_description: The Petzl Mini Prusik pulley features side plates that are designed to prevent a prusik friction knot from jamming the sheave while hauling.
